definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
orange juice/CL:瓶[ping2],杯[bei1],罐[guan4],盒[he2]/see also 橙汁[cheng2 zhi1]

sentences.english: Put some orange peels in the refrigerator and they can absorb odd smell.
sentences.chinese: 把橘子皮放进冰箱里可以把异味吸掉。

sentences.english: Bail was set at $50, 000, according to the Orange County Business Journal.
sentences.chinese: 据《橘子郡商业报》报道，保释金为五万美元。

sentences.english: He peeled an orange for her.
In the evening, we will end our trip at Juzizhou Park.
sentences.chinese: 到了晚上，我们将结束我们的行程在橘子洲公园。

sentences.english: On a hot day there's nothing I like more than a cold orange juice.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得，大热天没有比来杯橘子汁更过瘾的了。

sentences.english: The relative value of apples and oranges is determined by the tastes revealed in the fruit market.
sentences.chinese: 苹果和橘子的价值由水果市场上的评价来决定。

sentences.english: It is well known for its warm micro-climate favorable to lemon, tangerine, and orange groves.
sentences.chinese: 这是众所周知的温暖小气候有利于柠檬，橘子，橙园。

sentences.english: It is illegal to shake carpets in the street, or to throw orange peels on the sidewalk.
sentences.chinese: 在街上甩动地毯或将橘子皮丢在人行道上是违法的。

sentences.english: The sugar, salt and Tangerine powder disappeared, they were dissolved by water.
sentences.chinese: 糖，盐，橘子粉放入水中不见了，被水溶解了。

sentences.english: The waiter brought us a dish of orange segments.
sentences.chinese: 服务员给我们端来一盘掰开的橘子瓣。

sentences.english: I would like a jar of marmalade.
Add one dash of BOLS Bitter Orange. Shake with ice and strain.
sentences.chinese: 加少量波士橘子苦酒，加冰块摇合，滤入玻璃杯。

sentences.english: He said he had bought a 5-pound bag of ora …
sentences.chinese: 他说他已经买了一袋五磅的橘子。

sentences.english: He squeezed an orange to get the juice out.
sentences.chinese: 他挤压橘子一便榨出桔汁。

sentences.english: One of the most popular fall and winter fruits is tangerines.
sentences.chinese: 在秋冬季节最受欢迎的水果之一是橘子。

definition: pomelo (Citrus maxima or C. grandis)/shaddock/oriental grapefruit
litchi or lychee fruit (Litchi chinensis Sonn.)
